name: E2-R Echolution 2 Remote
details:
Remote switch for Echolution delayThe Exhalation 2 remote switch is a two button momentary controller that allows instantaneous access to your top 4 presets in each bank on the Exhalation 2 and Exhalation 2 Deluxe. The E2 Remote also facilitates the Exhalation 2s Freeze function as well as the all new Jump function that sends your echoes cascading up in octaves on each repeat.
https://pigtronix.com/product/echolution-2-remote/
